scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove nativescript-mqtt && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
